content.raw:
Thanks, @\_jrivero\_!

Even though I've been dealing with these for a while, I still get confused. I think it might help if we have very clear language to differentiate the SDF C++ library from the SDF protocol. Do you mind if I edit this a bit to try and make this difference clearer?
